title: Mocha Hot Chocolate Ratio

items.name: Hot chocolate mix
items.details: 1-1.5 tablespoons of hot chocolate mix, or 1-2 oz of melted chocolate syrup.

items.name: Richer/sweeter adjustment
items.details: Add more hot chocolate mix (closer to 2 tablespoons) for a richer, sweeter mocha.

items.name: Lighter adjustment
items.details: Stick to about 1 tablespoon of hot chocolate mix for a lighter taste.

notes: This ratio is a general guideline. Adjust to personal taste preference.
